item.title: USGS Geochemistry Database. Part I: Get that data
item.description: Context For reasons beyond the scope of this blog (see this publication, a follow up of my presentation at the GRC Organic Geochemistry 2018, I have done some serious data mining within the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Geochemistry Database. Chatting with folks at a conference, I realized many organic geochemists did not know about this resource, and those who knew about it, never went up the hill to check for information nuggets it may contain.
